name: Green Corridor
description:
Game name - The Green Corridor

Green corridor is the pathway which is created by the traffic whenever there is an 

emergency vehicle in action like Ambulance or a fire brigade and is stuck. 

When the normal traffic sees the Emergency vehicle , they change move their vehicles aside

giving a way to pass for the ambulance.

The Player's challenge will be to swap between cars and create the corridor in a given

tim frame.

Physics elements Showcased - Kinematics, Friction, Laws of motion, Ray optics 

and effects of lighting.

Group Members - 

1. Nishant Verma - 20BCG10094

2. Piyush Chourasia - 20BCG10054

3. Guneet Singh - 20BCG10065

4. Ayush Kumar mishra - 20BCG10023
